price: ចំពោះបុគ្គលម្នាក់ៗក្នុងចំណោមពួកគេនៅថ្ងៃនោះ គឺគិតតែពីខ្លួនឯងប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
